caption.p:
Effect of the aqueous soluble fraction of A. tenuifolius (AS-AT) on (a) ACE inhibitory activity, (b) erythrocyte carbonic anhydrase activity, and (c) renal Na +/K +/ATPase activity. Results are stated as mean ± SEM, whereas
∗∗∗ = P < 0.001 when compared to normal saline-treated group (control).
